org.example

Class ValueReferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.example.ValueReferences

  • public class ValueReferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to describe a measurement request. Create an object with a key that is the name of the data measured requested and a Collection of sensor from which retrieve that data. JSON obtained {"valueName" : "references" }

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> references
      Value of the data referenced
      private java.lang.String valueName
      Name of the data measured: like "temperature"

      Constructor to create a ValueReferences object that wants the data from a collection of sensors
      protected ValueReferences(java.lang.String valueName, java.lang.String reference)
      Constructor to create a ValueReferences object that want the data from only one sensor
